sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer

Class DrinkSelectionBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.customer.DrinkSelectionBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DrinkSelectionBox
extends java.awt.Panel
    This interface object is part of the Customer Panel. It is used by the Customer to select a drink.
    Version:
    1.0 2008-10-01
    Author:
    Team SE16T5E
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • update

        public void update(int brand,
                   int quantity,
                   int price,
                   java.lang.String name)
        This method updates the stock status, name and price of a drink brand based on the values received.
        Parameters:
        brand - the brand of the drink
        quantity - the quantity of the drink
        price - the price of the drink
        name - the name of the

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean active)
        This method will activate or deactivate the drink selection buttons.
        Parameters:
        active - TRUE to activate, FALSE to deactivate the drink selection buttons.

      • setState

        public void setState(int index,
                     boolean active)
        This method activates or deactivates the drink selection buttons on the Customer Panel.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the drink brand.
        active - TRUE to activate, FALSE to deactivate the drink selection buttons.

      • setItemState

        public void setItemState(int index,
                         boolean active)
        This method activates or deactivates the drink selection buttons on the Customer Panel. This method also displays OUT OF STOCK messages where appropriate.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the drink brand.
        active - TRUE to activate, FALSE to deactivate the drink selection buttons.
